data.name: InsertAcasDiscoveredSoftware
data.value: INSERT INTO Software (Software_ID, Discovered_Software_Name, Displayed_Software_Name, Is_OS_Or_Firmware) VALUES (NULL, @Discovered_Software_Name, @Displayed_Software_Name, @Is_OS_Or_Firmware);

data.name: InsertCklUniqueFinding
data.value: INSERT INTO UniqueFindings (Unique_Finding_ID, Comments, Finding_Details, First_Discovered, Last_Observed, Approval_Status, Delta_Analysis_Required, Finding_Type_ID, Finding_Source_File_ID, Status, Vulnerability_ID, Hardware_ID, Severity_Override, Severity_Override_Justification, Technology_Area, Web_DB_Site, Web_DB_Instance, Classification, Tool_Generated_Output) VALUES (NULL, @Comments, @Finding_Details, @First_Discovered, @Last_Observed, @Approval_Status, @Delta_Analysis_Required, @Finding_Type_ID, @Finding_Source_File_ID, @Status, @Vulnerability_ID, @Hardware_ID, @Severity_Override, @Severity_Override_Justification, @Technology_Area, @Web_DB_Site, @Web_DB_Instance, @Classification, @Tool_Generated_Output);

data.name: InsertGroup
data.value: INSERT INTO Groups VALUES (NULL, @Group_Name, 'False', NULL, NULL);

data.name: InsertHardware
data.value: INSERT INTO Hardware VALUES (NULL,@Host_Name,@FQDN,@NetBios,@Is_Virtual_Server,@NIAP_Level,@Manufacturer,@ModelNumber,@Is_IA_Enabled,@SerialNumber,@Role,NULL);

data.name: InsertIpAddress
data.value: INSERT INTO IP_Addresses VALUES (NULL, @IP_Address);

data.name: InsertMacAddress
data.value: INSERT INTO MAC_Addresses VALUES (NULL, @MAC_Address);

data.name: InsertPort
data.value: INSERT INTO PPS VALUES (NULL, @Port, @Protocol);

data.name: InsertUniqueFinding
data.value: INSERT INTO UniqueFindings () VALUES ();

data.name: InsertUniqueFindingSource
data.value: INSERT INTO UniqueFindingsSourceFiles VALUES (NULL, @Finding_Source_File_Name);

data.name: InsertVulnerability
data.value: INSERT INTO Vulnerabilities () VALUES ();

data.name: InsertVulnerabilityReference
data.value: INSERT INTO VulnerabilityReferences VALUES (NULL, @Reference, @Reference_Type);

data.name: InsertVulnerabilitySource
data.value: INSERT INTO VulnerabilitySources () VALUES ();
data.comment: Roughed out SQLite command to insert vulnerability source into the VulnerabilitySources

data.name: MapHardwareToSoftware
data.value: INSERT INTO SoftwareHardware (Software_ID, Hardware_ID) VALUES (@Software_ID, @Hardware_ID);

data.name: MapIpToHardware
data.value: INSERT INTO HardwareIpAddresses VALUES (@Hardware_ID, @IP_Address_ID);

data.name: MapMacToHardware
data.value: INSERT INTO HardwareMacAddresses VALUES (@Hardware_ID, @MAC_Address_ID);

data.name: MapPortToHardware
data.value: INSERT INTO Hardware_PPS (Hardware_ID, PPS_ID) VALUES (@Hardware_ID, @PPS_ID);

data.name: MapReferenceToVulnerability
data.value: INSERT INTO Vulnerabilities_VulnerabilityReferences VALUES (@Vulnerability_ID, @Reference_ID);

data.name: MapVulnerabilityToCci
data.value: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO VulnerabilitesCCIs VALUES (@Vulnerability_ID, (SELECT CCI_ID FROM CCIs WHERE CCI = @CCI));

data.name: MapVulnerabilityToIAControl
data.value: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO Vulnerabilities_IA_Controls VALUES (@Vulnerablity_ID, (SELECT IA_Control_ID FROM IA_Controls WHERE IA_Control_Number = @IA_Control));

data.name: MapVulnerabilityToSource
data.value: INSERT INTO Vulnerabilities_VulnerabilitySources VALUES (@Vulnerability_ID, @Vulnerability_Source_ID);

data.name: SelectAcasVulnerabilitySource
data.value: SELECT Vulnerability_Source_ID FROM VulnerabilitySources WHERE Source_Name = @Source_Name AND Source_Version = @Source_Version AND Source_Release = @Source_Release;

data.name: SelectFindingTypeId
data.value: SELECT Finding_Type_ID FROM FindingTypes WHERE Finding_Type = @Finding_Type;

data.name: SelectGroup
data.value: SELECT Group_ID FROM Groups WHERE Group_Name = @Group_Name;

data.name: SelectHardware
data.value: SELECT Hardware_ID FROM Hardware WHERE Host_Name = @Host_Name;

data.name: SelectIpAddress
data.value: SELECT IP_Address_ID FROM IP_Addresses WHERE IP_Address = @IP_Address;

data.name: SelectMacAddress
data.value: SELECT MAC_Address_ID FROM MAC_Addresses WHERE MAC_Address = @MAC_Address;

data.name: SelectPort
data.value: SELECT PPS_ID FROM PPS WHERE Port = @Port AND Protocol = @Protocol;

data.name: SelectSoftware
data.value: SELECT Software_ID FROM Software WHERE Discovered_Software_Name = @Discovered_Software_Name;

data.name: SelectUniqueFinding
data.value: SELECT Unique_Finding_ID FROM UniqueFindings WHERE Vulnerability_ID = @Vulnerability_ID AND Hardware_ID = @Hardware_ID;

data.name: SelectUniqueFindingSourceFile
data.value: SELECT Finding_Source_File_ID FROM UniqueFindingsSourceFiles WHERE Finding_Source_File_Name = @Finding_Source_File_Name;

data.name: SelectVulnerability
data.value: SELECT Vulnerability_ID FROM Vulnerabilities WHERE Unique_Vulnerability_Identifier = @Unique_Vulnerability_Identifier;

data.name: SelectVulnerabilityReference
data.value: SELECT Reference_ID FROM VulnerabilityReferences WHERE Reference = @Reference AND Reference_Type = @Reference_Type;

data.name: SelectVulnerabilitySource
data.value: SELECT Vulnerability_Source_ID FROM VulnerabilitySources WHERE Source_Name = @Source_Name;

data.name: UpdateAcasUniqueFinding
data.value: UPDATE UniqueFindings SET Tool_Generated_Output = @Tool_Generated_Output, Last_Observed = @Last_Observed, Status = @Status WHERE Unique_Finding_ID = @Unique_Finding_ID;

data.name: UpdateCklUniqueFinding
data.value: UPDATE UniqueFindings SET Finding_Details = @Finding_Details, Comments = @Comments, Severity_Override = @Severity_Override, Severity_Override_Justification = @Severity_Override_Justification, Last_Observed = @Last_Observed, Technology_Area = @Technology_Area, Web_DB_Site = @Web_DB_Site, Web_DB_Instance = @Web_DB_Instance, Finding_Source_File_ID = @Finding_Source_File_ID, Status = @Status, Approval_Status = @Approval_Status, Delta_Analysis_Required = @Delta_Analysis_Required, Tool_Generated_Output = @Tool_Generated_Output WHERE Unique_Finding_ID = @Unique_Finding_ID;

data.name: UpdateDeltaAnalysisFlag
data.value: UPDATE UniqueFindings SET Delta_Analysis_Required = 'True' WHERE Vulnerability_ID = @Vulnerability_ID;

data.name: UpdateVulnerability
data.value: UPDATE Vulnerabilities SET WHERE Vulnerability_ID = @Vulnerability_ID;

data.name: UpdateVulnerabilitySource
data.value: UPDATE VulnerabilitySources SET WHERE Vulnerability_Source_ID = @Vulnerability_Source_ID;

data.name: VerifyVulnerabilityChange
data.value: SELECT Vulnerability_ID, Release FROM Vulnerabilities_VulnerabilitySources NATURAL JOIN Vulnerabilities NATURAL JOIN VulnerabilitySources WHERE Unique_Vulnerability_Identifier = @Unique_Vulnerability_Identifier AND Vulnerability_Source_ID = @Vulnerability_Source_ID;

data.name: VerifyVulnerabilitySourceChange
data.value: SELECT Vulnerability_Source_ID, Source_Version, Source_Release FROM VulnerabilitySources WHERE Source_Name = @Source_Name;
